hero_section.title: Compliance
hero_section.description: At Zan Footwear, we are committed to ethical manufacturing, sustainability, and maintaining the highest international compliance standards. Our products are made responsiblyâ€”ensuring fair labor, eco-conscious materials, and premium craftsmanship.

commitment_section.title: Our Commitment to Compliance
commitment_section.description: Zan Footwear strictly adheres to international compliance standards ensuring ethical manufacturing, environmental responsibility, and worker welfare at every step of production.

features.title: Ethical Manufacturing
features.description: We operate under fair labor practices, maintaining safe working conditions and equitable wages.

features.title: Sustainable Materials
features.description: From recycled leather to eco-friendly rubber, sustainability is built into every pair we craft.

features.title: Audited Supply Chain
features.description: Our factories undergo regular third-party audits to maintain compliance and transparency.

features.title: Certified Standards
features.description: We are certified by globally recognized organizations including Amfori BSCI, Sedex, and ISO.

certifications.title: Amfori BSCI
certifications.description: Ensuring ethical supply chains and fair labor practices.

certifications.title: Sedex
certifications.description: Promoting transparency and sustainable sourcing across our operations.
